mapper.update: update tb_planinfo set plan_type = #{planType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, plan_begin_date = #{planBeginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, plan_over_date = #{planOverDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, plan_explain = #{planExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_supplement = #{planSupplement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_createtime = #{planCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lcd = #{lcd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select plan_id, plan_type, plan_begin_date, plan_over_date, user_id, plan_explain, plan_supplement, plan_createtime, lcd from tb_planinfo where plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select plan_id, plan_type, plan_begin_date, plan_over_date, user_id, plan_explain, plan_supplement, plan_createtime, lcd from tb_planinfo
